welcome_message_body: Welcome to Edgewater Park, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly community. We can't wait for you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at PHL, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, with modern amenities and serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at PHL, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at PHL, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in different areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free and unlimited wifi access is available throughout the airport.
